alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 2:14PM MST until January 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the High Wind Warning, from 8 AM to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roadways. Areas of blowing snow on Wednesday will limit visibility to less than one mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If holiday decorations are still displayed outside, gusty winds on Wednesday could damage or blow these decorations away.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
